svg.text: Regenerative Capital Scorecard Application - Decision Tree by Role
What is your primary role in

g.text: • How does this reduce systemic risk?
• Can this achieve 8-12% IRR + high RoR?
• Can this transition to stewardship trust?
• Weight Community Sovereignty questions 2x in Ethical section
• Require Indigenous partnership verification for land-based projects
• Add systems-change catalyst questions to RoR section
• Add IRR/RoR integration calculations to Economic section
• Weight mission protection mechanisms in Leadership section
• Include Golden Share and stewardship transition clauses
• Emphasize local economic multiplier in Economic section
• Require community-controlled verification for all claims
• Add intergenerational equity questions to all sections
• Weight ecological commons stewardship in Ecological section
• Include Hearthstone Protocol transition options in exits
• Annual Reality Check: Teams confront uncomfortable truths about investments • Truth Advocate: Board member champions truth-seeking, rewards bad news

svg.text: Source: The Capital Weaver - Chapter 11: The Regenerative Investment Thesis
